experiences.title: Gap Year
experiences.subtitle: Mental Health Recovery
workDescription: After undergoing an emergency surgery in January 2022, which happened during my last year of University , I recognized the importance of prioritizing my mental and emotional recovery. Understanding the significance of taking time for self-care, I made the decision to embark on a gap year to fully recuperate and regain a sense of balance in my life.

During this gap year, I dedicated myself to a holistic healing process, focusing on both physical and mental well-being. I engaged in various activities and practices that promoted relaxation, personal growth, and self-reflection.

Ultimately, the gap year served as a transformative period of healing, growth, and self-care. It provided the necessary space and time to recover from the physical and emotional impact of the surgery, enabling me to return to my professional pursuits with renewed focus, energy, and mental well-being.
